#summary Description of the source code
#labels Phase-Implementation

= Getting the source =

You can get the complete source code in one .tar.gz file on the download page, or by [http://pentominos.googlecode.com/files/pentominos_0.1-1.tar.gz clicking here].
Although there are files in the SVN repository, you should ignore them due to their age.


= IDE =

This project is made with Eclipse and ESbox v2, testing in Scratchbox v1. Automake is used during the build process.


= Classes =

The program is made up by the following classes, each described in the respective files:
  * [MyWindow]
  * [PentominosTable]
  * [PentominosMenuItem]
  * [PentominosButton]
  * [PentominosField]
